涒字的基本解释

涒
tūn
〔涒滩〕古代十二地支中“
食后呕吐。申”的别称，用于纪年。

涒
yūn
〔涒邻〕（水流）回旋曲折。

涒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tūn］
［《廣韻》他昆切，平魂，透。］
食后复吐。
[②]［yūn］
［《集韻》紆倫切，平諄，影。］
见“涒2鄰”。

涒字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涒； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页627第01
【唐韻】【集韻】?他昆切，音暾。【說文】食巳而復吐之。　又【爾雅·釋天】太歲在申曰涒灘。【註】涒，史作汭。　又【集韻】紆倫切，音奫。涒?，水流曲折貌。【郭璞·江賦】涒?㘤潾。　又俱倫切，音麋。又于云切，音熅。義?同。

涒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
涒字的起名意思

指古代十二地支之一，也指水流回旋曲折。

Basic explanation of words
vomit
tūn
[Hutan] Ancient Twelve Earthly Branches"
Vomiting after eating. Another name for "Shen", used to record the year.
vomit
yūn
[Hua Lin] (The current) turns and twists.
vomit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tūn］
["Guangyun" he Kunqie, calm and thorough. ]
Relapse after eating.
[②]［yūn］
["Ji Yun" 纡lunqie, flat and honest, shadow. ]
See "Hu 2 Neighbors".
vomit
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　涒; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 627 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? He Kunqie, Yintun. [Said the text] vomiting after eating.　[Erya·Shitian] Tai Sui is in Shenyue Hutan. [Note] Hu, Shi Zuoxun.　[Jiyun] 纡lunqie, sound 奫. Huo? The water has a tortuous appearance. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Hu? 㘤潾.　It's all the same, and the sound is moose. Yu Yunqie again, the sound is 熅. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
Refers to one of the twelve earthly branches in ancient times, and also refers to the twists and turns of water.
tūn, yūn
I прил. tūn
большой, великий
II гл.
1) * tūn стошнить; отрыгнуть
2) yūn извилисто течь (о потоке)
